original_text: The soldiers from Ammon and Moab started to attack the soldiers from Edom. They destroyed Edom's army. When they had done that, they started to fight against each other. So they all destroyed one another.
korean_text: 곧 암몬과 모압 자손이 일어나 세일 산 주민들을 쳐서 진멸하고 세일 주민들을 멸한 후에는 그들이 서로 쳐죽였더라

sentences.original_text: The soldiers from Ammon and Moab
started to attack the soldiers from Edom
they started to fight against each other
So they all destroyed one another
